abstract: The automaker is using bar code technology for a logo-based campaign to get consumers to seek more information about its products.
snippet: The automaker is using bar code technology for a logo-based campaign to get consumers to seek more information about its products.
lead_paragraph: TOYOTA MOTOR SALES U.S.A. is adopting interactive bar codes across all its marketing so mobile phone-carrying customers can quickly access sales promotions, vehicle quotes, videos, safety tips and similar information.

headline.main: Snap and Send, and Learn More About Toyota
headline.print_headline: Snap and Send, And Learn More About Toyota
